column4: maverick: to my understanding the Intel Core Duo E6600 supports the Extended Memory 64 Technology EM64T which is "supported" in the Ubuntu 64 bit version
maveric: my apologies, I have the Intel Core 2 Duo
can anyone help me with installing 64 bit Ubuntu on an Intel Core 2 Duo machine? I am having trouble getting the cd to boot past a certain poing (sits at "Booting Kernel")
try this site if you want info on what intell chips support 64 bit http://or1cedar.cps.intel.com/isn/community/en-us/blogs/mult-core_com/archive/2006/09/20/30224178.aspx
